revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Hardscale Gouran |image = XC3 Hardscale Gouran.png |caption = Hardscale Gouran |type = [[Merigna]] |level = 66 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Oshia's Reef Ravine]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = 1,589 |cp = 187 |sp = 5 |gold = 1,044 |hp = 1,588,400 |strength = 1,192 |healing = 486 |dexterity = 237 |agility = 229 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = 10% |critrate = 15% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Hardscale Gouran''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Merigna]] family, and can be found at level 66 at [[Oshia's Reef Ravine]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. It forms the trio "Whirlpool Triumvirate" with [[Sharpscale Ragoon]] and [[Fairscale Marina]]. The [[Dragon Decree]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] can be earned for the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it. == Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = 60% |knockback = 100% |blowdown = 100% }} {{clr}} == Gallery == <gallery> Whirlpool triumvirate location.png Whirlpool triumvirate gouran.png </gallery>
[[Category:XC3 Level 66-70 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:XC3 Merignas]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Harness Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Break resistance by 35 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 13,140 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Harness Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Break resistance by 40 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 13,140 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Harness Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Break resistance by 45 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 13,140 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Harness Belts''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Harvest Necklace (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Harvest Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts amount of HP healed from using healing Arts by 10%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Harvest Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts amount of HP healed from using healing Arts by 11%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Harvest Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts amount of HP healed from using healing Arts by 12%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }}

It only affects [[Healer]]s and prevents them from taking any actions during the effect. The debuff is only inflicted b..."
revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Heal Bind |caption = Incapacitates Healers. |image = File:XC3 Heal Bind.png |type = Debuff | attribute = Ether | base-duration = 20.0s | rng-applicable = No | effect-title-4 = Remarks | effect-value-4 = This debuff cannot be removed by Arts or effects that clear debuffs. }} '''Heal Bind''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}}. It only affects [[Healer]]s and prevents them from taking any actions during the effect. The debuff is only inflicted by [[Moebius]] enemies whenever they use the Art "''Moebius Dominion: Healers''", and cannot be inflicted by the player's party.
[[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Healing Amulet (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Healing Amulet |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Restores 5% of HP when a buff is applied. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Healing Amulet |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Restores 5.5% of HP when a buff is applied. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Healing Amulet |image = XC3 Accessory Ring.png |caption = Restores 6% of HP when a buff is applied. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 22,450 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Healing Amulets''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Heartkiller Igna |image = |caption = Heartkiller Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 45
99 |area = [[Elaice Highway]] ([[Igna Conglomerate]])
[[Erythia Sea]] ([[Rebellion Cave]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Heartkiller Ignas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 45 at the [[Igna Conglomerate]] on [[Elaice Highway]], or at level 99 in [[Rebellion Cave]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} == In {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Heartkiller Igna |image = Heartkiller Igna FR.jpg |caption = Heartkiller Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 35 |area = [[Aurora Shelf]] ([[Declessa Cave Temple Ruins]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Heartkiller Ignas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 35 at the [[Declessa Cave Temple Ruins]] on the [[Aurora Shelf]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{Fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 96-100 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 31-35 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Ignas]] [[Category:XC3FR Ignas]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Heavy Foot Protector |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts evasion by 15% while stationary or auto-attacking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 6590 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Heavy Foot Protector |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts evasion by 16% while stationary or auto-attacking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 6590 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Heavy Foot Protector |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Boosts evasion by 17% while stationary or auto-attacking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 6590 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Heavy Foot Protectors''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{quote|A Defender who protects allies with a huge weapon and Arts to focus the enemies' attention.|Class menu description}} [[File:XC3 Heavy Guard Weapon Icon.png|thumb|180px|The Heavy Guard class icon]] '''Heavy Guard''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ヘヴィガード}}, ''Hevi Gādo'') is a [[Keves]]i [[Defender (XC3)|Defender]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Heavy Guards specializes in [[Battle Arts (XC3)|arts]] that attract [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] while protecting allies with a huge shield-like weapon. With many means of attracting enemies, it is a powerful shield for the party. The [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]] of the Heavy Guard is [[Mad Taunt (XC3)|Mad Taunt]]. It is the initial class of [[Lanz]]. {{clr}} == Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements == {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |1,575 |3,150 |2,365 |3,940 |''Starting Class †'' |0 ‡ |} † Lanz starts at Rank 5 in the class when in the player's party for the first time.
‡ Acquired automatically in Chapter 2, after viewing the "Consul K" event (which occurs after resting at the [[Hillside Ferronis Hulk]] during the main story) == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 155 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 155 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 195 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 5 | 195 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 6 | 235 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 235 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 250 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 250 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 270 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Side Story: Lanz]]'' |- | 11 | 345 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 12 | 345 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 455 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 455 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 15 | 570 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 16 | 570 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 685 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 685 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 19 | 740 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 20 | 850 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Heavy Guard class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 120% || 75% || 20% || 90% || 70% || 40% || 30% |- | 10 || 125% || 77% || 22% || 95% || 72% || 45% || 32% |- | 20 || 130% || 80% || 25% || 100% || 75% || 50% || 35% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. If the weapon is [[Blade Upgrade|upgraded]], all values in the table are increased by 20% (multiplicatively) for the character wielding it (fractions are rounded to the nearest integer). {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 17 || 4% || 25% |- | 10 || 38 || 4% || 26% |- | 20 || 69 || 5% || 27% |- | 30 || 106 || 5% || 28% |- | 40 || 148 || 6% || 29% |- | 50 || 196 || 6% || 30% |- | 60 || 251 || 6% || 31% |- | 70 || 312 || 7% || 32% |- | 80 || 380 || 7% || 33% |- | 90 || 457 || 8% || 34% |- | 99 || 534 || 8% || 35% |} == Arts == * '''[[Mad Taunt (XC3)|Mad Taunt]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]), AOE / Taunt * '''[[Bull Rush]]''', [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]] * '''[[Variable Turret]]''', Block attacks * '''[[Crash Out]]''', AOE / High aggro (Rank 1 Master Art) * '''[[Uppercut Slash]]''', High aggro * '''[[Solid Stance]]''', Def. up / Atk down (Rank 10 Master Art) == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 6.png]] '''Defensive Soul''', Boosts Physical Defense by 10-20%. (Rank 5 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 4.png]] '''I'll Protect You''', Reduces damage taken by allies in a fixed radius by 20-30%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 4.png]] '''Tenacious Blocker''', Boosts Block Rate by 30-50% when HP is at 30% or lower. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 12.png]] '''Aggravator''', Accrues Aggro every second. === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:80%;" !Class Rank !Defensive Soul !I'll Protect You !Tenacious Blocker !Aggravator |- | 1 | 10% | 20% | 30% | 10 |- | 5 | 12% | 22% | 35% | 12 |- | 10 | 15% | 25% | 40% | 15 |- | 15 | 17% | 27% | 45% | 25 |- | 20 | 20% | 30% | 50% | 30 |} == Gallery == XC3 Lanz Artwork.png|Lanz as a Heavy Guard Heavy Guard Noah.png|Noah as a Heavy Guard Heavy Guard Mio.png|Mio as a Heavy Guard Heavy Guard Eunie.png|Eunie as a Heavy Guard Heavy Guard Taion.png|Taion as a Heavy Guard Heavy Guard Sena.png|Sena as a Heavy Guard == References == {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]
